contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Enable Quick Page Editing from Your Xperience by Kentico Website Channels
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: The very prolific Kentico MVP, Liam Goldfinch, brings us a double decker of a Kentico community contribution. A new open-source integration adding the "edit" button from older Kentico Portal Engine solutions to Xperience by Kentico and a blog post to introduce it. Thanks Liam!
